DOC.brief_summary: Study design prospective , randomised , double-blind , interventional . Primary aim study investigate efficacy antiseptic-coated intermittent hydrophilic urinary catheter prevention reduction catheter-associated urinary tract infection child neurogenic bladder . Secondary aim assess feasibility antiseptic-coated intermittent hydrophilic urinary catheter neurogenic bladder management . Octenidine chloride use antiseptic .
DOC.criteria: neurogenic bladder use intermittent catheterisation neurogenic bladder management informed oral write consent child parents/legal guardian Congenital anomaly urinary tract genitals Immunodeficiency Urinary tract fistula
